name: Blast Raccoon Galaxy V1.0 <Platformer>
description:
After 3 months of modifying code, making sprites, composing music, and designing levels, I present you Blast Raccoon Galaxy! An epic, retro platformer inspired by the original Sonic the Hedgehog series! Delve into 18 space themed levels, hit the jump pad and do a 360' spin, shrink to miniscule sizes and collect rainbow crystals! In the end you must blow up Dr.Mechanical's Mother Ship in order to save Blast's Girlfriend "Emma Raccoon"! Let me know how you like it! And please consider following as much more is to come! Have a Blast! 

Click_Here_To_Meet_Me_On_Scratch!
